products.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: An ergonomic office chair designed for comfort during long hours of work, with adjustable height and lumbar support.

products.name: Recliner Lounge Chair
products.description: A comfortable recliner lounge chair for relaxation with plush padding and adjustable backrest.

products.name: Dining Chair Set of 2
products.description: A set of 2 modern dining chairs with wooden legs and a cushioned seat for comfort.

products.name: Folding Chair
products.description: A portable folding chair for easy storage and transport, perfect for outdoor events and gatherings.

products.name: Adjustable Bar Stool
products.description: An adjustable bar stool with a sturdy base and sleek design, ideal for kitchens or home bars.
